amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Skaggs amendment, specifying that continued funding for TV Marti broadcasts to Cuba would only end after fiscal year 1997 if the President certifies that continued funding is not in the national interest of the United States.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart to the Skaggs amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 271 - 155 (Roll no. 159).
